lead_paragraph: Mets steady closer Jeurys Familia stumbled for a second straight game, allowing two runs in the ninth inning as the Colorado Rockies beat New York 2-1 Thursday for their seventh win in eight games.

headline.print_headline: Familia Falters Again, Rockies Rally for 2-1 Win Over Mets
headline.main: Familia Falters Again, Rockies Rally for 2-1 Win Over Mets

snippet: Mets steady closer Jeurys Familia stumbled for a second straight game, allowing two runs in the ninth inning as the Colorado Rockies beat New York 2-1 Thursday for their seventh win in eight games....
